item.title: 【UPSCALED】Tate McRae - exes [4K 2160p AM | HEVC 10-bit | PCM 24-bit 44.1 kHz | DD+ Dolby Atmos]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic, Pop
Style: Dance-pop
Year: 2023
Video Source: Apple Music, thanks SonMaxime
Audio Source: Qobuz & Apple Music, thanks moi & SonMaxime

"Exes" is a song by Canadian singer-songwriter Tate McRae. It was released on November 17, 2023, through RCA Records as the second single from her upcoming second studio album, Think Later.

Following the release and commercial success of her single "Greedy", McRae announced Think Later on November 6, 2023, her upcoming second studio album. The creative process behind the album was described by McRae as [one of] "the most stressful, exciting, nerve racking, and fun things" she has ever experienced. On November 14, 2023, McRae confirmed the release of "Exes" on her Instagram and TikTok. The announcement post on Instagram was captioned with the lyric "kisses to my xx", while she had previously teased the song in a TikTok video a few days prior. In promotion of her upcoming album, McRae performed on the November 18, 2023, episode of Saturday Night Live.

Release Info
The video track is downloaded from Apple Music by SonMaxime (2160p HEVC 10-bit), left as is.
The PCM track is lossless (Qobuz, Hi-Res, 24-bit 44.1 kHz), synced with Adobe Audition.
The Dolby Atmos track is lossy (E-AC3), synced to the video track by muxing.
The timed lyrics are synced & edited. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.

item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Ripped remixes from Björk´s Fossora boxset?
item.description:
Björk has released a new Fossora Boxset with 5 new exclusive reimagined tracks: https://shop.bjork.com/product/fossora-boxset/
The first people already received their copies. Please, can someone rip the 5 tracks in lossless? Thanks in advance!
item.author: MartinSlovak
